issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: help should be collapsed by default and only show when requested. Please implement according to wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+instance+view+-+refreshed
fields.summary: help should not display by default

comments.body: [~kyolee]: Feel free to borrow the pattern used in the expando for the Advanced section of the Launch More Instances Like This page at https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/blob/develop/koala/templates/instances/instance_launch_more.pt#L84 to implement the help content expandos.

looking better, almost there! A couple of things:

* landing page help should be implemented off canvas. See http://foundation.zurb.com/docs/components/offcanvas.html for details
* missing help on wizards. See https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Wizards+-+refreshed
* Screens without accordion implemented (still displaying help expanded): Launch more like this, attach volume, add policy to scaling group, register snapshot as image

Thanks!

I noticed that the single user detail page has the help implemented off canvas instead of as the expandable area in the right column. Off canvas should not be used for the detail pages, we have a column reserved for help there. It looks OK on the IAM group detail page, I think this one page got overlooked. Can you please fix this? Thanks!

I've noticed the ? help is tied to breadcrumbs. I've noticed some pages use CSS to turn off the help-icon (?). I've also noticed other pages that don't do that, and I haven't notice what turns it off. I suggest we have either 2 versions of breadcrumbs (one for landing pages, one for the rest), or make something that detects if we're on a landing page vs detail or wizard page and automatically handle the help-icon. That way, we don't have to deal with it piecemeal

[~jloza] [~dkavanagh] I'm not clear on what the action item is here. The landing page's help icon opens up the off canvas on the right, and the detail page has its own right column for the help message at the moment.

[~kyolee]: We've added CSS to hide the help icon on the user detail page.  The icon was displaying since that page pulls in landing page styles for the group tiles, and a one-line CSS fix was added to hide the icon (see https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/commit/ec406eb6e9c)

So to answer your question [~kyolee], I don't think there's anything else to do here.  We can prolly move this on to QA (or maybe to [~jloza] for a final look).

Are all the other issues I previously noted fixed? specifically these:

* missing help on wizards. See https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Wizards+-+refreshed
* Screens without accordion implemented (still displaying help expanded): Launch more like this, attach volume, add policy to scaling group, register snapshot as image

[~jloza] Those issue have been resolved back in 07/Feb/14, according to the comment above. More over, some of those pages are in a dialog form at this point, thus they have no help message panel to display. Please check out the status of the current help display and let us know if anything is missing.

[~kyolee], [~kgill], attach volume still has help displayed at the bottom. That stuff should be hidden under an expando. See attached screenshot. I can't check the scaling group wizard or the attach policy because the clc is throwing a 403 error at me, but if you could please verify those when you fix this that would be great. Thanks!

[~jloza] If the help message on those dialogs are to be hidden by default, then we are going to need a new dialog wireframe for the expando since we will need to know what it looks like when it is closed.

Hi [~kyolee] I put one here for an example to follow for attach volume: https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/terminate+instance+refreshed

Holler if you have any questions or need anything else!

[~jloza] The attach volume dialog was the only dialog that had help messages displayed. The rest of the dialogs did not have any additional help messages assigned.

However, for the terminate instance dialog, a help message placeholder was placed for you to add its help message later on.

* policies tab on scaling group details view *still* missing help expando
* it's also missing for the instances tab

Please, please fix *both* of these before resubmitting for review.
